description:
Le Mystere des voix Bulgares* (also known as the Bulgarian State Orchestra and Female Vocal Choir) produced some absolutely amazing records during the 80's and 90's. Traditional vocal pieces of Bulgaria have been re-arranged and professionally conducted by Bulgaria's finest conductors and turned into an unforgettable, haunting experience. Even if you are not much in to A Capella or Folklore, you should definitely give them a try as their sound is most unique.

This is the second volume, recorded in 1988. I also uploaded the first volume, so be sure to check out my torrent list.

  
Check out my other torrents for folk, avant-garde, jazz and experimental music, all ripped in FLAC.

Unfortunately, my bandwidth is somewhat limited, but I will continue to seed for a very long time, so just be patient ;-)
